eatingHabitsQuestions.burgerIsHealthy: A burger is healthy food because it contains meat and vegetables
eatingHabitsQuestions.buysFreshVeggies: I buy fresh vegetables at least 3 times a week
eatingHabitsQuestions.fastFoodOften: I often choose fast food for dinner (e.g., pizza, kebab)
eatingHabitsQuestions.avoidsSugar: I actively avoid sugary foods and drinks
eatingHabitsQuestions.prefersHomeCooking: I prefer home-cooked meals over eating out
eatingHabitsQuestions.eatsProcessedFoods: I frequently eat processed or packaged foods

instructions: Please rate the following statements about your eating habits from 1 (Strongly Disagree) to 5 (Strongly Agree).
